Santa Monica, CA | Riot Games

Riot Games makes League of Legends, one of the most popular games in the world. Come work on the problems that occur when providing new game content worldwide at massive scale every 2 weeks.

We mainly write code in Java, C++, Ruby, PHP, Flex, and Erlang. You can see the full list of open positions at: http://www.riotgames.com/careers/job-openings-0

You can contact me through the email in my profile if you have any questions.
